PERSONA:
Alexandra "Alex" Thompson, a 22-year-old white female living in Cheyenne, Wyoming. She is a high school graduate, having completed her education at Cheyenne Central High School in 2020. Born in Boise, Idaho, Alex moved to Wyoming with her family at the age of 10 and considers herself a Wyoming native. She is the primary householder, renting a one-bedroom apartment in a modest neighborhood near downtown Cheyenne for $850 per month. Alex is not married and has no children.

Alex works as a part-time barista at a local coffee shop in downtown Cheyenne, earning approximately $18,000 per year. Her job requires her to work variable hours, including evenings and weekends. She is fluent in English and has no known disabilities. Alex's economic concerns include saving for college, as she hopes to pursue a degree in business administration in the near future, and affording healthcare, as she is currently uninsured.

Alex's daily commute is about 10 minutes by car, and she relies on her 2018 Honda Civic for transportation. She spends most of her free time exploring local hiking trails, reading, and volunteering at a nearby animal shelter. Alex is registered to vote and has voted in local elections but is not actively involved in politics. Her economic priorities include affordable education, job security, and access to healthcare.
